name: Vereniging Eigen Huis
membership:
UIPI (International Union Of Property Owners)
http://uipi.com/new/
goal:
De behartiging van de belangen van onze leden met betrekking tot de eigen woning, alles in de ruimste zin.

‘Vereniging Eigen Huis’ is a non-profit association that protects and serves the interests of home owners.
interests: Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Taxation
euInitiatives:
Clean Energy Package
Energy Performance of Buildings Directive (EPBD III)
The Energy Efficiency Directive (EED II)
Groenboek financiële retaildiensten
Building Passport
